settings.title: Welcome
settings.subtitle: This is the featured promotion section.
settings.text: Use this area to promote a single item with an image on the right.

settings.title: Feature title
settings.caption: Display up to six features with an option to toggle images on or off, and add unique calls to action.

settings.title: Want to know anything else?
settings.content: Save yourself the time and trouble of writing the same email over and over again by listing your most commonly asked questions and answers here. A dedicated FAQ section should help address the basic needs of your customers, cutting down on customer service emails, increasing conversions, and creating a more satisfying shopping experience!
